Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! I hear your store's sold over 10 million G
worth of goods! Is that true?!
<PAGE>
That's amazing! Any tips you can share on how
to succeed?

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear that your store's sold a million G worth of
goods!
<PAGE>
Somebody up there must really like you!

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear that you've managed to sell 100,000G
worth of goods!
<PAGE>
That's wonderful! Keep it up!

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't believe my eyes! What a deal!

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing quite as satisfying as dropping a
ton of G on something nice and pricey, don't
you think?

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I bought a souvenir for my daughter! I hope
she'll like it.

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like I'm going home empty-handed. What
a disappointment...

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wanted to buy something for my daughter, but
maybe next time.

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I couldn't buy anything today. But I guess that
means I'm saving up for something better later
on.

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, my, you came here to shop too?

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do I want? Jewels, of course!

<NAME_MOB_BRIGITTA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, what do I want more, jewels or flowers?
Tough choice...
